restructureit.refactorings.processors

Class EncapsulateField

  • java.lang.Object
    • spoon.processing.AbstractProcessor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtField<?>>
      • restructureit.refactorings.processors.EncapsulateField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    spoon.processing.FactoryAccessor, spoon.processing.Processor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtField<?>>

    public class EncapsulateField
extends spoon.processing.AbstractProcessor<spoon.reflect.declaration.CtField<?>>
    Performs the refactoring Encapsulate Field. It makes a public field private and adds getters and setters to allow access. Reference: http://www.refactoring.com/catalog/encapsulateField.html
